channel.title: Project Mantineia [Whitelisted] [1% Finished]
channel.description:
[center]Hello guys, i'm looking too start a minecraft server. Me and my friend have had a passion for it for awhile, I've got some money to invest! I just have decided to buy a server host, and it's been made official. Now heres what I need. I need my spawn made, i'm currently working on the Rules section.
The server is currently whitelisted, Since I don't have any protection mods installed, so how you get access to the server is you have to add me on skype... I will decide if you should be able to join or not and if you're trust-able.. I'm very passionate about running a Minecraft server..
I know i'm not very active on these forums, but i've been registered for awhile. I'm going to sound hypocritical about how trustworthy I want people to be.
Heres a list on how people will be ranked..
[Regular] [V.I.P] [Builders]
Lin
[Moderator] [Developer] [Administrator] [Founder]
Format for each ranks.
~ Regular ~ - All you have to do is join when server is open -
~V.I.P~ All you have to do is pay a 5$ fee.
~Builder~ Add my skype; 'TheLimeVodka' Whats your skype name: "Here" Pictures of your builds: - Here - Previous projects: - Here - Why do you want to be a part of this project? "Here"
~Moderator~ -Closed rank-
~Developer~ Add my skype; 'TheLimeVodka' We'll talk there.
~Administrator~ -Closed Rank-
~Founder~ -Closed Rank-
Server information[/center]

item.title: Project Mantineia [Whitelisted] [1% Finished]
